gdts.common.comm.messages

Interface IMessage

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IDataMessage<T>, IStatusMessage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataMessage, FileTransferMessage, InstanceFileTransferMessage, InstanceListingMessage, InstanceListingRequestMessage, ListingMessage, ListingRequestMessage, MasterMessage, MasterReleaseSlaveMessage, MasterReqSlaveMessage, MasterStartSlaveTaskMessage, Message, PingMessage, SimpleStatusMessage, SlaveCheckInMessage, SlaveTaskResultsMessage, StartTaskInstanceMessage, StatusMessage, TaskFileTransferMessage, TaskListingMessage, TaskListingRequestMessage, TaskResultsMessage

    public interface IMessage
    Główny interfejs klas komunikatów.
    Author:
    Maciej Milczarek

        long getInReplyTo()
        Returns:
